          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vrv s tovorom privezana na balon na topli zrak se pretrga</string>
            <string language="en">Rope between cargo and hot air balloon tears apart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seil zwischen Ladung und Heißluftballon reißt 
auseinander</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La corde entre la cargaison et le ballon à air 
chaud déchire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A corda entre a carga e o balão de ar quente 
rasga distante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La corda fra carico e l'aerostato di aria calda 
stacca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχοινί μεταξύ του φορτίου και του μπαλονιού καυτού
αέρα ξεσκίζει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La cuerda entre el cargo y el globo del aire 
caliente rompe en dos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Balon dviga tovor, ko se na določeni višini pretrga vrv.</string>
            <string language="en">Balloon is lifting cargo when rope tears apart</string>
          </description>

          <description>

          </description>
          <description>

          <description>
